description:
Good-for-nothing son of http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou]. Deemed as `boyfriend` by http://anidb.net/ch16864 [Kimiko] though he dumped her during the hostage negotiation in favour of keeping the drugs he stole from the drug peddling syndicate.
Was scolded by father http://anidb.net/ch16971 [Banzou] in his youth for indulging in video games for 2 years instead of working, but when son saw that father was jobless (due to company restructuring) even though he worked so hard, he became disillusioned and turned to illicit `jobs` like drug peddling.
name: Tasuke
